channel.title: Im using hamachi for my server.. what i have to do to run my client wit hamachi?
channel.description: im using hamachi for my server.. what i have to do to run my client wit hamachi? i gave the people who wanna play my server the hamachi ip. also i using silab client with hamachi and they login but it logs them out automatically? whats problem?

item.title: Im using hamachi for my server.. what i have to do to run my client wit hamachi?
item.dc:creator: @joelx617 joelx617
item.description:
@joelx617 wrote:

well then how should i start up my server without using my ip from ipchicken.com?
and the ip that i have from ip chicken is my router’s ip is that safe?

Read full topic

item.title: Im using hamachi for my server.. what i have to do to run my client wit hamachi?
item.dc:creator: @dzertus dzertus
item.description:
@dzertus wrote:

whats your router??
and yes put your www.ipchicken.com IP(the ip that it shows)
well putting your shared IP can be dangerous… cause like that ppl have your IP and they can do whatever they want

item.title: Im using hamachi for my server.. what i have to do to run my client wit hamachi?
item.dc:creator: @joelx617 joelx617
item.description:
@joelx617 wrote:

dude i already port fowarded and it not helping cuz it dont let them connect when i do that with port fowarding and using no-ip… i have a no-ip but didnt work they always get this error message when trying to login… “error connecting to server”

Read full topic
item.source: Im using hamachi for my server.. what i have to do to run my client wit hamachi?

item.title: Im using hamachi for my server.. what i have to do to run my client wit hamachi?
item.dc:creator: @dzertus dzertus
item.description:
@dzertus wrote:

well hamachi dont portforward… portforwarding is needed to the server run you cant just open the server and wait to it open the ports alone…
get a no-ip and learn how to portforward, many tutorials at tutorial sections
if you dont want to get a no-ip then you will have to share your own ip
to get it go to www.ipchicken.com

Read full topic
